name: Cyberwave Beetle Attack
description:
School Game on the "Space Shooter" theme.

You must hold press the fire button 1 second

Constraints:

-2 enemies minimum

-2 bonus

-Highscore

Credits:

Thomassin Gregoire - Programmer Chihi Mondhor - Programmer Alberti Fabien - 3D Artist / UI Artist / Trailer Roux Tristan - 3D Artist / VFX Artist Ginier Romain - Sound Designer (arrived 2 days before the end)

The music of the trailer and in game was not made by us but it's free to use
